TopicTitle: focusing camera on a station part

Articles.Content:
Is there a way to set the camera focus on a selected part, in flight?

Currently, the camera seems to be focused on the center of the craft bounding box.

You can Mid-click and drag as a way of looking around, but that's rather clunky.

Edited August 25, 2015 by yerdnadm
Middle mouse button does some deviation. Just press mousewheel and drag the mouse. Also camera tools mod has the target selection to target a specific parts, but most of the time mmb will do.
The camera focuses on the CoM of the craft. right-click Drag is the only way to change camera focus.

Also camera tools mod has the target selection to target a specific parts

Thank you
